tracks.topDesc: A beautiful, subtlely-progressive track that grows into something magnificent from one of Ireland's best indie rock bands.
tracks.mainDesc: One of my favourite tracks of the year, from its beautiful start to its powerful buildup and breathtaking ending.

tracks.topDesc: A raw, emotional acoustic track from Cavan singer-songwriter James Bentley's debut EP.
tracks.mainDesc: From the eerie beginning, to the towering chrous that slowly builds into a very powerful ending, this track is definitely one to check out.
